name: Incus 0.6
body:
# Announcement
https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/incus-0-6-has-been-released/19134

## What's Changed
* incusd/instance/qemu/qmp: Don't risk blocking QMP on eject by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/448
* Fix Github CI and OVN peer issue by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/451
* incusd/apparmor: Allow more mounts in unprivileged containers by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/452
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/454
* fix: use genisoimage when mkisofs is not found by @bketelsen in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/453
* incusd/instance/qemu/agent-loader: Handle legacy lxd-agent-loader by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/455
* Expose OVN logic router name in state API by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/456
* scripts/bash: Don't follow aliases by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/460
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/461
* test: Adapt test_database_no_disk_space() to newer libraft versions by @freeekanayaka in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/462
* incus/launch: Fix --console by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/464
* Add support for template file uid/gid/mode by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/469
* lxd-to-incus: Clear cache on migration by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/470
* Bump minimum Go version to 1.21 by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/471
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/473
* Add support for unprivileged binfmt_misc by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/474
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/476
* incus/image: add dynamic command line completions by @adamcstephens in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/477
* Improve and document support for encrypted keys by @PriceChild in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/468
* lxd-to-incus: Indicate what existing configuration was found by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/480
* Add support for all-projects to incus image list and API by @MaheshPunjabi in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/400
* shared/cliconfig: Fix static analysis by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/481
* Fix go.mod causing OVN startup issues by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/488
* VM agent tweaks by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/489
* incus/config: add completions by @adamcstephens in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/490
* incusd/device: Bump base VM filesystem volume to 500MiB by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/501
* incus-agent: Load virtio_net before configuring NICs by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/495
* doc/faq: Add mention of the -mtu network interfaces by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/496
* Make lvm.vg.force_reuse server-specific by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/500
* Improvements to empty instance handling by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/502
* incusd/instances: Use correct project on cross-project copy by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/503
* incusd/patches: Fix bad SQL query by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/504
* incusd/instances: Don't bypass instance limit check by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/505
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/506
* Add storage bucket backup by @maveonair in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/365
* Fix golang-ci failures by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/508
* Remove ceph special-casing in remote storage by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/509
* OVN improvements in lxd-to-incus by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/510
* lxd-to-incus: Support Void Linux by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/511
* Disable the architecture check on `incus copy`/`incus mv` by @presztak in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/513
* Introduce clustered LVM (shared block storage) by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/512
* incusd/storage/lvm: Fix import shadowing by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/514
* incusd/storage/lvm: Tweak locking in cluster by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/515
* Prevent custom storage volumes of type block to be used more than once by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/467
* incusd/instance/qemu: Cap hotplug CPU slots to 64 by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/516
* incusd/storage/zfs: Fix refresh of VM volumes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/517
* incusd/network/ovs: Wait for bridge interface to appear by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/518
* Fix volatile key definitions by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/519
* gomod: Update dependencies by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/521
* Static routes for OVN network forwards and load-balancers by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/520

## New Contributors
* @PriceChild made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/468
* @MaheshPunjabi made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/400

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lxc/incus/compare/v0.5.1...v0.6.0

name: Incus 0.5.1
body:
# Announcement
https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/incus-0-5-1-has-been-released/18848

## What's Changed
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/436
* incus/action: Fix resume by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/437
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/439
* Database performance improvements by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/440
* Cgroup controller detection tweaks by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/441
* doc/installing.md: add a gentoo-wiki link under Gentoo section by @juippis in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/443
* incusd/instance/qemu/agent-loader: Fix to work with busybox by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/442
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/444
* Add support for an agent drive (ISO) by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/446
* Various fixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/447


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lxc/incus/compare/v0.5.0...v0.5.1

name: Incus 0.5
body:
# Announcement
https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/incus-0-5-has-been-released/18814

## What's Changed
* incusd/instances/qemu: Don't fail event sending on missing agent by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/324
* incusd/network/ovsdb: Properly close the connections by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/325
* doc: Add Fedora installation instructions by @ganto in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/326
* Port more code to OVSDB by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/327
* Fix incorrect type in JSON metadata by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/331
* doc/installing: Add Arch instructions by @Foxboron in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/332
* lxd-to-incus: Clarify error messages by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/334
* doc/installing: Fix chocolatey link by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/337
* Fix OVS/OVN transaction handling by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/342
* incusd/network/ovn: Properly handle uplink with disabled DHCP/DHCPv6 by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/343
* incus: Create config paths when no local daemons by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/347
* lxd-to-incus: Support alternative snap path by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/349
* Support VM passthrough of USB NICs by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/350
* incusd/networks: Don't Fill network configs when joining by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/351
* incus/create: Set Target after network/storage lookup by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/353
* Update architectures documentation by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/354
* doc/migrate_lxd: Add mention of CLI configuration by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/355
* Improvements to snapshot command by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/356
* incus: Enable cobra's completion support by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/357
* incusd/instance/lxc: Re-generate lxc.conf during Exec by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/361
* Improve VM shutdown/reboot experience by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/362
* incusd/storage_pools: Don't crash on nil pool by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/359
* lxd-to-incus: Handle local OVN by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/358
* lxd-to-incus: Detect symlinks by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/363
* lxd-to-incus: touch completion file after migration by @adamcstephens in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/364
* incusd: Refresh the state on cluster put/join by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/366
* shared/cliconfig: Improve error handling by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/371
* incusd/instance/qemu: Don't hardcode UEFI firmware in checkFeatures by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/375
* incusd/firewall/xtables: Fix iptablesClear on nft shim by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/376
* incus/network: add dynamic command line completions by @adamcstephens in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/368
* Rework shared/idmap by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/369
* incus/project: Get current project from connection info by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/378
* incusd/cluster: Ensure the cluster member config is always sorted by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/380
* More idmap fixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/382
* incusd/instance/file: Add type and size to HEAD by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/383
* Add virtio-blk support for virtual machines by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/384
* Move db functions to ClusterTx by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/285
* loki: Drop grafana/dskit dependency by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/388
* Fix bulk unfreeze and add `resume` (or `unfreeze`) sub-command by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/387
* Add loongarch64 support by @zhaixiaojuan in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/370
* incus-agent: Handle built-in vsock module by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/389
* README: Re-introduce weblate by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/392
* incusd/network/acl: Avoid nested DB transactions by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/393
* Manual update to French translation and doc fixes by @smCloudInTheSky in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/391
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/396
* incusd/instance/qemu: Start using seabios as CSM firmware by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/394
* incusd/forknet: Handle wifi detach by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/395
* Revert minio import and add automated licensing checks by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/399
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/401
* Fix rare race condition in event handling by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/398
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/402
* Add support for `loki.instance` by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/403
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/405
* cmd/incusd/api_cluster: Join cluster transactions by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/409
* i18n: Remove empty translations by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/411
* Add support for starting instances on creation by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/410
* Docs windows install update by @nunix in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/407
* incusd/migration: Properly forward errors by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/412
* Add `incus file create` subcommand by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/408
* Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/415
* Add note about scrape_interval and update examples by @jalbstmeijer in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/416
* build(deps): bump actions/dependency-review-action from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/418
* cmd/incus: Remove unused `flagContent` variable in `incus file create` by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/417
* Fix in-cluster storage volume refreshes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/419
* lxd-to-incus: Stop using LXD client package by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/420
* CLI fixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/423
* lxd-to-incus: Fix issues found by golang-ci by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/425
* Introduce a runtime directory by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/426
* Improve installation instructions by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/428
* Add support for multiple agent binaries by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/427
* Optimize db transactions by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/429
* api_internal: Remove unreachable code by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/431
* Add more evacuate/shutdown options by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/433
* doc/installing: Add Void Linux by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/432
* incusd/instance/qemu: Add some ArchLinux EDK2 filenames by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/430
* internal/archive: Fix squashfs error handling by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/435

## New Contributors
* @ganto made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/326
* @Foxboron made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/332
* @zhaixiaojuan made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/370
* @smCloudInTheSky made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/391
* @nunix made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/407
* @jalbstmeijer made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/416

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lxc/incus/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: Incus 0.4
body:
# Announcement
https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/incus-0-4-has-been-released/18512

## What's Changed
* incusd/auth/openfga: Use chunking by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/244
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/243
* lxd-to-incus improvements by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/242
* docs: update iso import in instances_create by @bketelsen in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/248
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/253
* Add support for migrating from LXD COPR by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/252
* Some OpenFGA fixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/257
* doc/installing.md: add installation steps for Gentoo by @juippis in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/254
* Internal DB changes by @monstermunchkin in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/247
* doc: Add build instruction on AlpineLinux by @seia-soto in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/258
* incusd/apparmor/rsync: Fix in nested containers by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/260
* Tweak installation instructions layout by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/261
* Fix missing VM metrics by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/262
* Update outdated reference to new command for adding certificate by @jobtijhuis in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/264
* Fix OpenFGA cluster issues by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/266
* build(deps): bump actions/labeler from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/270
* doc/installing: init NixOS instructions by @adamcstephens in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/268
* More OpenFGA bug fixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/274
* doc/lxd-to-incus: Add mention of group changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/267
* incusd/auth/openfga: Fix handling of cluster members by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/276
* OpenFGA fixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/278
* doc: Fix url to documentation in CONTRIBUTING.md by @presztak in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/280
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/279
* Allow configuring OVN SSL settings through server configuration by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/281
* Fix header timeouts on operation wait by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/282
* Fix some storage issues by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/290
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/291
* lxd-to-incus improvements by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/293
* Add keepalive support in the client by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/295
* incusd/endpoints: Also hide read errors from proxies by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/296
* build(deps): bump actions/setup-go from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/298
* Add description field on certificate entries by @presztak in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/297
* Add variable certificate store columns by @rhburt in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/294
* Make sure we don't import LXD AGPL by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/299
* Import LXD changes (last batch before the re-licensing) by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/300
* lxd-to-incus: Update for LXD 5.20 by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/301
* Instance migration related fixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/303
* incus/instance/qemu: Remove legacy udev rule by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/304
* shared: Move idmap from internal by @hallyn in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/302
* Test bugfixes and typos by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/306
* test/golangci: Fetch GITHUB_BEFORE reference by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/307
* doc: Fixed typos by @colireg in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/308
* incusd/firewall/iptables: Make sure to always use locking by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/310
* lxd-to-incus: Add shiftfs check by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/311
* Doc tweaks by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/313
* build(deps): bump actions/upload-artifact from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/314
* Bump OpenFGA to 0.3.1 by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/317
* shared: Fix comments typo by @maveonair in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/318
* Start transition to libovsdb by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/319
* Set minimum OVN version to 22.03.0 by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/320
* incusd/network/ovs: Fix empty OVNBridgeMappings by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/321
* incusd/network/ovn: Wait for port to appear by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/322

## New Contributors
* @bketelsen made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/248
* @juippis made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/254
* @seia-soto made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/258
* @jobtijhuis made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/264
* @presztak made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/280
* @rhburt made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/294
* @hallyn made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/302
* @colireg made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/308
* @maveonair made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/318

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lxc/incus/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: Incus 0.3
body:
# Announcement
https://discuss.linuxcontainers.org/t/incus-0-3-has-been-released/18351

## What's Changed
* lxd-to-incus: query systemd instead of assuming service file path by @adamcstephens in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/201
* Add direct links to binaries by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/202
* cmd/lxd-to-incus: Unmount target paths by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/203
* doc: Link to migration guide from getting started by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/205
* cmd/lxd-to-incus: Add OpenRC target support by @xsoalokinx in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/204
* cmd/network {forward,load-balancer}: fix typo port to ports  by @loyux in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/206
* lxd-to-incus: Handle mountpoints by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/207
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/208
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/211
* Add OIDC and OpenFGA testing by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/210
* Fix handling of trusted certs in CA mode by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/221
* Fix task race condition by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/223
* lxd-to-incus: Various improvements by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/222
* Detect btrfs compression by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/225
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/226
* Tweak first use message by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/227
* incusd/device: The MTU can always be controlled by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/228
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/229
* doc: Update for trust add-certificate by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/230
* lxd-to-incus: Add support for OVN database mangling by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/231
* doc: incus -> incusd in build instructions. by @fwaggle in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/232
* lxd-to-incus improvements by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/233
* doc: replace lxc with incus in cmdStorageVolumeSnapshotShow example by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/235
* lxd-to-incus bugfixes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/234
* doc: Document INCUS_DOCUMENTATION by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/236
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/237
* Added text on the difference between containers and VMs by @simos in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/190
* Add support for virtiofs hotplug/hotremove by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/238
* Add support for filtering string slices by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/239

## New Contributors
* @adamcstephens made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/201
* @xsoalokinx made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/204
* @loyux made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/206
* @fwaggle made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/232
* @simos made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/190

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lxc/incus/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

name: Incus 0.2
body:
## What's Changed
* doc: change Incus_DIR to upper case INCUS_DIR by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/127
* README: Fix link to getting started by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/130
* doc: Add start-after to include CONTRIBUTING.md from contributing.md by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/131
* Makefile: Build doc in production mode by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/134
* Update lxd-to-incus to current Go package by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/135
* doc: Add "Then run the following command:" by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/141
* incus-user: Fix bad path by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/140
* doc: Remove "Configure a network section" in howto/network_create by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/144
* doc: Remove direct from reference/network_external/ by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/143
* doc: Make Incus_INSECURE_TLS uppercase by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/148
* doc: Align output of IPAM table by @hnakamur in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/145
* doc: Remove all mentions of trust passwords by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/149
* doc: Update Grafana screenshots by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/150
* build(deps): bump redhat-plumbers-in-action/differential-shellcheck from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/151
* github: Build static binaries for x86_64 and aarch64 by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/152
* cmd/incusd: Properly forward rebuild requests by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/157
* cmd/incus/admin_cluster: Fix re-exec logic by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/154
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/155
* doc: Remove UI tabs by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/160
* tests: Add incus-user test by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/159
* gomod: Update dependencies by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/161
* internal/server/seccomp: Fix clang build by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/163
* Backport LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/164
* instance/qemu: Tweak systemd/udev units of incus-agent by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/165
* lxd-to-incus: Add support for manually built LXD by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/169
* doc: Cleanup old LXD references by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/168
* shared/osarch: Add loongarch64 by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/171
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/172
* cmd/lxd-to-incus: Handle backups/images volumes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/174
* Tweak to dist tarball by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/175
* doc: Add packaging instructions by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/176
* Introduce requirements.privileged by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/182
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/181
* shared/cliconfig: Nicer error on missing socket by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/185
* instance/lxc: Fix swap limit handling by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/189
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/191
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/193
* lxd-to-incus improvements by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/194
* Add NVME disk support by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/195
* Import LXD changes by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/196
* Fix idmapped mount layer on intercepted mounts by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/197
* Add migration documentation by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/199
* lxd-to-incus: Fix bad check by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/198
* incusd/devices/disk: Always apply the disk options by @stgraber in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/200

## New Contributors
* @hnakamur made their first contribution in https://github.com/lxc/incus/pull/127

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lxc/incus/compare/incus-0.1...incus-0.2
